Talismane v4.0.1 API

Packages 
Package Description
com.joliciel.talismane
Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
com.joliciel.talismane.corpus
A package dealing with reading annotated corpora.
com.joliciel.talismane.examples
Various examples for typical Talismane usage.
com.joliciel.talismane.extensions
Entry point package for extensions.
com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.corpus
Various extensions for corpus manipulation and analysis, including classes for autoamtically modifying or projectifying a corpus, and classes for calculating corpus statistics.
com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff
A package for converting to and from CoNLL-X to standoff format, for interaction with annoation tools requiring this format.
com.joliciel.talismane.fr
Package for interaction with existing resources in French (such as the SPMRL French corpus), facilitating training and evaluation with these resources.
com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector
A package for training a language detector, based on a set of corpora, one per language, with one sentence per line.
com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon
Interfaces and generic classes for handling lexicons, which are used in Talismane within various tokeniser, pos-tagger and parser features and rules, as well as for certain types of filters (e.g.
com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning
Top-level package for machine-learning.
com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features
Generic features for use with Talismane machine learning, enabling various logical, mathematical and string manipulation functions in these features.
com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.linearsvm
Linear SVM implementation for machine learning, wrapping liblinear-java.
com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.maxent
Maximum entropy implementation for machine learning, wrapping OpenNLP MaxEnt.
com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.maxent.custom  
com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.perceptron
Perceptron implementation for machine learning.
com.joliciel.talismane.output
Classes and templates for producing Talismane's output in CoNLL-X and related formats.
com.joliciel.talismane.parser
Transition-based dependency parsing ( Parser), evaluation ( ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features
Various features specific to the dependency parsing phase.
The available feature descriptors are listed in ParserFeatureParser.addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer)
com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
The central class is the PosTagger.
com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features
Various features specific to the pos-tagging phase.
The available feature descriptors are listed in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features.PosTaggerFeatureParser#addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer))
com.joliciel.talismane.rawText
Package managing the initial filtering of an input stream, such as in the case of XML analysis, where the XML tags need to be removed, and in some case represent sentence breaks.
com.joliciel.talismane.resources
Default resources, used by Talismane in generic implementations.
com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators
Sentence annotators add annotations to the sentence after the raw text has been processed and broken up into individual sentences.
com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector.features
Features specific to sentence detection.
The available feature descriptors are listed in SentenceDetectorFeatureParser.addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer)
com.joliciel.talismane.stats
Statistical tools for use with Talismane, especially for evaluation.
com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
Tokenisation package.
com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features
Features specific to the tokenisation phase.
The available feature descriptors are listed in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features.TokenPatternMatchFeatureParser#addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer)))
com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns
A package for the pattern based tokeniser, which applies supervised machine learning to certain patterns in the text representing ambiguous tokenisation decisions.
com.joliciel.talismane.utils
Basic development utilities.
com.joliciel.talismane.utils.compiler
Dynamic compiler of programatically constructed Java classes, used to pre-compile features configured in configuration files.
com.joliciel.talismane.utils.io
Various I/O utilities.
